final_answer:
The image is funny and satirical because it juxtaposes two different meanings of "cleaning" a smartphone. 

On one side, it shows two cleaners literally using a squeegee and a mop to "clean" the large smartphone, implying a physical cleaning rather than digital. This humorous interpretation of "cleaning" is contrasted with a typical smartphone error message on the right side, which states "Unable To Install «Phone Cleaner»" due to insufficient memory.

The satire highlights the absurdity of needing an app to "clean" your phone while playing on the literal act of cleaning, poking fun at common digital frustrations and the irony of tech maintenance.
